questions.questionText: Which of the following are characteristics of mammals? (Select all that apply)

options.text: They produce milk to feed their young

questions.hint: Think about what defines mammals as a class of animals
questions.explanation: Mammals are characterized by having hair or fur, producing milk for their young, and being warm-blooded (maintaining constant body temperature). While most mammals give live birth, a few like the platypus do lay eggs, so option C is not universally true.
